# platform-exporter

> Export OSSA agents to 12+ platforms (npm, Docker, K8s, MCP, Cursor, etc.)

## Quick Reference

- **Type**: OSSA Agent v0.4.1
- **Category**: exporters
- **Manifest**: platform-exporter.ossa.yaml

## Overview

Export OSSA agent manifests to platform-specific formats.
Supports npm, Docker, Kubernetes, MCP servers, Cursor agents, and more.
Generates complete, production-ready packages for each platform.

capabilities:

## Related

- Main OSSA documentation: /README.md
- Agent manifest: ./platform-exporter.ossa.yaml
- Agent details: ./AGENTS.md
